attributes.action: Home Office/Border Agency to close borders or quarantine people on arrival.
attributes.additional_details: Whilst we are dealing with the virus and in lockdown, it goes without saying that the best course of action is to cease or heavily restrict flow into the country and anyone that absolutely must enter this country should be subject to a couple of weeks quarantine regardless of whether they have been tested elsewhere before entering. This is just common sense to reduce the risk of reoccurrence.
attributes.background: The vast majority of us are abiding by the lockdown and are dismayed that the government are still allowing people into the country with no sign of them being accurately tested or quarantined. This puts the country at risk and is why we have this problem in the first place.

You may wish to sign these petitions calling for the same action.

Close down all UK airports & seaports to prevent further spreading of Covid-19: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/300932

Close the Borders of the United Kingdom to Prevent the Spread of Coronavirus: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/309332

Enforce a 14 day quarantine on all new arrivals to the UK: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/312500

Find out more and watch the Committee put questions suggested by petitioners to Government Ministers and the Deputy Chief Medical Officer: https://committees.parliament.uk/committee/326/petitions-committee/news/145767/committee-question-deputy-chief-medical-officer-and-ministers-on-coronavirus-response/
